summary: The eight-year marriage of Liyan and Yuwen has left them both unfulfilled and distant. A visitor arrives from Shanghai, a doctor who's an old school friend of Liyan's and, unbeknownst to her husband, Yuwen's childhood sweetheart.
cast: Jingfan Hu|Jun Wu|Bai Qing Xin|Xiao Keng Ye|Si Si Lu
title: Primavera en Smalltown
